titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty-free treatment of oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/4/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to acrylic or modacrylic: oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers. Provides for a staged rate reduction for such item.
